TopicTitle: [0.25] Where do you find stock parts ?

Articles.Content:
I have read through a few tutorials and examples for modding stock parts of KSP, but all of those seem to be out of date.

Most talk about looking into the \Parts directory and copying one of the parts there to have a base.. but that directory is empty!

I have only recently bought the game over Steam, so 0.25 is the first version i got, so has this changed so much with this version ? Or do i need to extract these files out of some archive/dll ?

Nvm, found it.

All the tutorials show that the \Parts directory is in root game directory, but it seems that it is now inside \GameData too.
You can find all stock parts in: "<Your KSP directory>\GameData\Squad\Parts\"
